name: PHP AnyXML
short_description: AnyXML is an XML read-only class which offers PHP5 SimpleXML's capabilities on ANY host, even if PHP4 and/or without the expat extension; AnyXML will always choose the best available library to offer its functionality. Your solution to PHP+XML messes.
